channel.title: Bob Kane on jverkamp.com
channel.description: Recent content in Bob Kane on jverkamp.com

item.title: The Dark Knight Rises
item.description: This is another movie right up there with the Avengers in terms of anticipation and I have to say that it delivered. There’s just something about super hero movies that’s going particularly well right now. I’m not sure how long this is going to last, but I’m more than happy to ride it while it does.
